name: Dumbbell Thruster (Squat + Press)
setup: Stand feet shoulder-width, dumbbells at shoulders (neutral grip)
steps: Descend into a front squat keeping elbows slightly forward
Drive up powerfully and continue into an overhead press
Lock out overhead with biceps near ears; return DBs to shoulders and repeat
mistakes: Pressing early before finishing the leg drive
safety: Choose a load you can control in both phases. If shoulders are sensitive, reduce range or switch to push press or front squat only.

progressions: Tempo descent or pause at bottom

prescriptionHints.notes: Use legs to finish the press; avoid lumbar overextension.

joints.notes: Keep heels down and brace; reduce depth if knees complain.
